tool_description: Retrieve information about a domain's certificate.
title: SSL Certificate

api_list.name: IP
api_list.description: Retrieve the IP of the certificate. This is often the IP of the server itself.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ssl-certificate.p.rapidapi.com/ip/{domain}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ssl-certificate.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Uses SHA1
api_list.description: Retrieve if the certificate uses the unsafe SHA1 hashing method.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ssl-certificate.p.rapidapi.com/uses_sha1/{domain}"

    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ssl-certificate.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
